title: Plan & Billing
description: Update your plan or credit card
sub_header: Update your billing details and address.
change_payment: Change how you pay for your plan.

plan.downgrade_helper: Downgrading to free will cancel your subscription at the end of your billing period on {{end}}. You'll still have access to your plan features until then.
plan.subscription_ends: Your plan will end on {{end}}. All pages will be lost.
plan.billing_cycle_downgrade: Your plan ends on {{end}}. Your new plan “{{new_plan}}” will start on {{start}}

form.sub_email: Invoices will be sent to this email address.
form.sub_invoice_recipient: The name that appears on the invoice.

requires_payment_method.title: Your latest payment failed
requires_payment_method.text: Our latest attempt to charge your card failed. Please update your card details below, and we will attempt to charge your card again.

requires_action.title: You need to authorize your payment
requires_action.text: In order to process your latest subscription payment, you need to authorize the transaction with your bank. Please check your email for a link to do this, then refresh this page when you're done.

canceled.title: Your subscription has been canceled
canceled.text: In order to continue using the app, please select a new plan and complete the payment process.

scheduled.text: Your subscription plan will be downgraded to the {{plan}} plan in the next billing cycle, starting on {{date}}.
